channel.title: Chrysler Pacifica Camping on Relentless Optimizer
channel.description: Recent content in Chrysler Pacifica Camping on Relentless Optimizer

item.title: Pacifica Camping Build
item.description: We wanted to be able to sleep in our Pacifica, and for it to be more comfortable and faster to get to bed and get going than a random motel.

item.title: Pacifica Climate Control Circuit
item.description: We wanted to camp overnight in our 2018 Chrysler Pacifica Hybrid. If the van is plugged in or the battery is charged enough, the climate system can run overnight without the engine turning on.
